title: DoorDash is temporarily cutting small restaurant fees in half
description: DoorDash is reducing commissions for local restaurant partners by   percent in an effort to help businesses survive the COVID   crisis  The food delivery service says the program will benefit over     restaurants in the US  Canada and Australia on both
